address: Address: 251 Red River Road (Inside Goods & Co.)
text:
Chipotle Unwrap 14.85

Tofu or chicken atop fresh greens, sprouted lentils & roasted red peppers. Topped with Sesame Snaps & house-made Chipotle dressing. Served with warm naan.

Harvest Salad 14.85

Fresh greens & sprouted lentils topped with chicken, pears, feta cheese & dried cranberries. Drizzled with house-made Harvest Dressing & served with toast.

Spinach Artichoke Pizza 15.85

Whole wheat tortilla base, local gouda, spinach, roasted red peppers, artichoke hearts, feta cheese & pesto drizzle, garnished with greens and sprouted lentils.

Today's Soup 8

Potato Mushroom

Venus Rice Bowl Special

Tofu or Chicken atop Brown Rice, lentils, [unclear word, possibly "sprouted"] & beets and Spinach. Topped with sesame seeds and our Tahini Dressing.

Antipasto Sunset

Toasted naan served around a bed of roasted carrot, red pepper, tomato, and onion, with a blend of herbs and spices.

10 (presumably the price)

Midnight's Smoothie

Banana, Blueberry, Vanilla yogurt, whey and Oatmilk

12oz $7.00

Kids Menu

Snack Plate $8.00

Cheesy toasted naan bread, Sliced pear, and carrot sticks, with Ranch on the side

Thunder Melt $6.25

Gouda cheese melted on rye toast, Served with carrot sticks on the side

-Add chicken or tofu- $3.00

Growing Poutine 15.85

Roasted potatoes, brussel sprouts and cauliflower. Topped with Thunder Oak cheese curds & house-made pesto aioli.

Side Salad 8.00

Greens, sprouted lentils/carrots topped with pumpkin seeds and house-made lemon vinaigrette, served with local rye toast.

Soup 'n' Salad Special 13.75

A cup of today's Soup & our house Side Salad, Served with a slice of Rye bread on the Side.

-Add-ons-

Avocado 2.50 each
Chicken 3 each
Tofu
Thunder Oak Gouda
Feta cheese
Extra dressing
Cranberries 2.5 each
Pumpkin seeds 2 each
Sprouted lentils
Sesame Snaps
Shredded Carrots
Roasted red peppers
Smoothies

Chocolate Avocado 10.00

Banana, avocado, oat milk, chocolate whey protein

Vanilla Latte 10.00

Banana, ice coffee, oat milk, vanilla whey protein

Berry Cream 10.00

Banana, blueberry, strawberry, oat milk, vanilla whey protein

Love Potion 10.00

Strawberry, yogurt, banana, oat milk, vanilla whey protein

Cocomania 10.00

Strawberry, banana, coconut water, flax
name: Growing (Inside Goods & Co.)
